scc_data Struct Reference


Data Fields

uint32_t length
uint8_t * in
uint8_t * out
unsigned direction
fsl_shw_sym_mode_t crypto_mode

Detailed Description

Structure passed during ioctl() call to request SCC operation

Field Documentation

fsl_shw_sym_mode_t crypto_mode

CBC or EBC

unsigned direction

encrypt or decrypt

uint8_t* in

input data

uint8_t* init_vector

initialization vector or NULL

uint32_t length

length of data

uint8_t* out

output data
